content.rendered:
Directed by Vivek Agnihotri

Written by Vivek Agnihotri. Saurabh M. Pandey

Star Mithun Chakraborty (Brahma Dutt). Anupam Kher (Pushkar Nath Pandit). Darshan Kumaar (Krishna Pandit). Pallavi Joshi (Radhika Menon). Chinmay Mandlekar (Farooq Ahmed Dar (Bitta Karate)). Prakash Belawadi (Dr. Mahesh Kumar). Puneet Issar (DGP Hari Narain). Bhasha Sumbli (Sharda Pandit). Sourav Verma (Afzal). Mrinal Kulkarni (Laxmi Dutt). Atul Srivastava (Journalist Vishnu Ram). Amaan Iqbal (Karan Pandit)

Language Hindi

Producers Abhishek Agarwal. Tej Narayan Agarwal. Mallika Agnihotri. Vivek Agnihotri. Parv Bali. Parv Bali. Atul Bhagat. Sarahna Deep. Jayprakash Rao Dhote. Gaurav Gautam. Gaurav Gautam. Pallavi Joshi. Anupam Kher. The Makers Buzzz. Deepak Mishra. Santosh Paswan. Mayank Singhania. Kaali Sudheer

Production Zee Studios. Abhishek Aggarwal Arts. I Am Buddha
